articles.description: From resistance bands and Bala bangles to folding workout bikes on Amazon, these under-$150 devices make working out just a little more pleasurable, and definitely affordable.
articles.content: Are you one of the millions of people whove made a resolution to take care of their body by exercising more in 2021? Whatever your reasons for wanting to up your exercise game, the benefits go beyond… [+7157 chars]
